job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse in Batesville, AR
pros: Benefits are good, coworkers are always there to assist. Management really does listen and ack on suggestions.
cons: Company values its employees very much, but does lack some incentive to retain experienced workers. Such as, no bonuses for the workers but upper management got bonuses one year.

job_title: Certified Registered Nurse Anesthetist in Batesville, AR
pros: facilities and equipment are nice, the area is also nice if you are an outdoorsy type. Large main facility with multiple smaller hospitals, clinics also.
cons: culture of system needs to change, very little respect given to the nurses - even APRNs, PAs etc are treated like they are disposable.

job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse in Little Rock, AR
pros: I think it was a good place to work. Accomodates schedules, pretty good management, always looking to improve quality care, good employee benefits
cons: The pay wasn't great for LPNs. Enormous amount of responsibility for not great pay. drama was a little too much, at times unprofessional conduct with managers gossiping about employees.

pros: Friendly employees.  My boss showed she cared. Hourly employees no overtime.
cons: Less employees but with more workload. Most job opportunities are for clinical personnel.
